mapper.select: SELECT cipher.cipher_uuid AS cipherUuid, cipher.cipher_email AS cipherEmail, cipher.cipher_password AS cipherPassword, cipher.gmt_create AS gmtCreate, cipher.gmt_modified AS gmtModified FROM tbl_cipher AS cipher WHERE cipher.cipher_email = "2414776185@qq.com" LIMIT 1;

SELECT ciphers.cipher_uuid AS cipherUuid, ciphers.cipher_email AS cipherEmail, ciphers.cipher_password AS cipherPassword, ciphers.gmt_create AS gmtCreate, ciphers.gmt_modified AS gmtModified FROM tbl_cipher AS ciphers LEFT JOIN tbl_user AS users ON users.user_email = ciphers.cipher_email WHERE users.user_uuid = #{userUuid} LIMIT 1;
